lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon on Monday ignored pleas from human rights activists to ask President Hu Jintao to release Liu Xiaobo from jail.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon on Monday ignored pleas from human rights activists to ask President Hu Jintao to release Liu Xiaobo from jail.

headline.main: Secretary General Ignores Pleas to Ask China to Free Nobel Peace Prize Winner
